```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)

```

```{r}
spotstl <- read_csv("spotstl.csv")
sharespotstl <- read_csv("sharespotstl.csv")
sharespotstypetraffic <- read_csv("spottypetraffic.csv")

```

```{r}
 ggplot(aes(x= numspots, y = trafficlightcount), data = spotstl) + geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```

```{r}
sharespotstypetraffic %>% ggplot(aes(x = typecount, y = trafficcountavg)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = "lm") + facet_wrap(~spottype)

```
